title: Documents detail plans to gut Twitter’s workforce
description: The impact of such layoffs would likely be felt immediately by millions of users and would put them at risk of hacks and exposure to offensive material such as child pornography, insiders said.

title: Stop iPhones from spying on kids with this new app
description: Do Not Track Kids, made by an ex-NSA researcher, works behind the scenes to block connections to data brokers and ad companies.

title: ‘New Tales from the Borderlands’ is a perfect spiritual successor
description: “New Tales from the Borderlands” takes a lot of what made Telltale’s gameplay unique and either keeps it the same or improves on it.
